extendedInfo.description: Hubi is the ultimate Android solution for streaming and downloading your favourite videos from the most popular streaming services. And it's free.â LATEST UPDATES!--------24/04/2013BIG UPDATE! More hosters (180Upload, Vodu, and many more), many corrections to current hosters, fix for NowVideo (blacklisted in Italy). No more long waitings if an hoster's support breaks up, thanks to our new system. The best of it all? Still free. Enjoy ;)--------â SUPPORTED SERVICESHubi currently supports these 39 (!) services:â 180Uploadâ AllMyVideosâ BillionUploadsâ DaClipsâ DivXStageâ DwnSoâ EcoStreamâ FileBoxâ FileNukeâ GorillaVidâ MovPodâ MovReelâ MovShareâ MuchShareâ NosVideoâ NovaMovâ NowVideoâ PutLockerâ ShareSixâ ShareRepoâ SockShareâ SockShareâ StageVuâ StreamCloudâ UploadCâ UploadHeroâ VeeHDâ VidBullâ VidHogâ VideoBeerâ VideoSlasherâ VideoWeedâ VidxDenâ Vkâ Voduâ VReerâ YouTube (streaming only)â Zalaaâ Zinwaâ WANT TO GET RID OF THOSE ADS?Just press "Remove ads" from within the application and, for a small charge, you won't ever see another ad popping up!â FEATURESâ¥ >> NO Flash player required! <<â¥ Download: watch your videos offline, anytimeâ¥ Clean UI: full Ice Cream Sandwich and Jelly Bean compatibilityâ¥ Playback: choose your favourite video player (MX Player, VPlayer, MoboPlayer, ..)â¥ Integration: system-wide! Just click on any supported video link to open Hubiâ¥ Social: share your favourite video links with your friendsâ¥ History: keep track of your watched videosâ¥ Download Manager: native Android download, always available, *background* download feature included!Rate and let us know your feedback! Enjoy ;)Please note that the video content which can be played with Hubi is not owned by MegaDevs but it belongs to external services (the hosters), to which this application is not affiliated by any means. Hubi does not host any of the video content, neither it provides search functions or video link directories. Any copyright infringement is to be imputed to users only.

reviews.title: Love it!

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: The app is fantastic and works really well. It allows the streaming and downloading of movies to be really efficient and easy. It works really well overall very impressed.

reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work with all the links you\'d expect sometimes, but with te ones it does it does exactly what you need and does it well.

reviews.comment: Works ok on galaxy s3 but not at all on galaxy tab, just says broken link even though the link is fine on phone

reviews.comment: This is Great for certain video streaming sites. The advantage is these particular sites hosting the videos tend to be the most reliable for content and fastest.  Well made. Ta

reviews.title: Great app.
reviews.comment: love this app it downloads very fast using virgin broadband not so fast on talktalk. But it\'s way better than the download manager that comes inbuilt in my Samsung galaxy tab 2. Highly recommend this app. Good job.

reviews.title: Hubi
reviews.comment: Hubi is okay, I guess. The only problems that I have are that it needs more improvement and that sometimes it doesn\'t buffer correctly.
